name: Add a new row in Google Sheets for every moved Trello card
description: Streamline your project management by tracking card movements in Trello and automatically logging them in Google Sheets. With this template, every time a card is moved in Trello, Make will create a new row in your Google Sheets, allowing you to maintain a comprehensive record of your project progress and changes. This setup is perfect for teams looking to enhance their workflow visibility and accountability.
